Package com.khaledbakhit.api.rslib.ruleset

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Condition
    Condition class can either represent a classification or a metrics formula (Rule condition).
    DefaultRuleSetWriter
    DefaultRuleSetWriter is the default implementation of the RuleSetWriter abstract class.
    It outputs RuleSets in the default form that can be parsed by a DefaultRuleSetParser class instance.
    DefaultRulSetVerifier
    DefaultRuleSetVerifier is the default implementation of RuleSetVerifier abstract class.
    Auto-correct mode may lead to incorrect corrections, especially if all metrics/classifications differ by one character.Use with caution.
    Rule
    Rule represents a rule inside a RuleSet.
    RuleSet
    RuleSet Object represents a RuleSet that contains many Rules and a default classification that help it classify DataSet cases.
    RuleSetFactory
    RuleSetFactory handles importing RuleSets.
    RuleSetVerifier
    RuleSetVerifier is made to verify that all classifications and metrics used inside a RuleSet file are defined and available in LaunchSetup.input_class_file and LaunchSetup.input_metric_file.
    RuleSetWriter
    RuleSetWriter is used to output RuleSets.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RuleSet.TestingMode
    Testing Mode versions.
    RuleSet.TestingMode.SEQUENTIAL is default mode.
